Class Message

java.lang.Object
  messaging.Message
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChatMessage, QuizAnswer, QuizQuestion, SystemMessage
public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

All data which is passed between the clients and the server has to be derived from this class

yvonne
